title: [New Champ Idea] Abox,Unknown hunter     Abox=Alpha,Beta,Omega X is for design :D
body:
Names Abox 
Known as hunter.
No one knows where is he from,Whats his real name,Who he really is
Humankind?A robot?An Alien?No
He is Energy


Passive: Abox is a hunter he can track enemies that passed somewhere in past 15 sec (only footsteps,enemies aren't visible to them) OR after 5 sec looking at somewhere he can see through the wall or bush and pass through them for 200 hp (more or less :D you choose)

Q: Illusion: Abox unleashes him self into energy goes on stealth for 5 seconds and gain 30%  Movement speed

W: Energy wall: Abox shots an energy wall (Like {{champion:157}}) avoiding enemies abilities and ranged basic hits he can move it for 5 seconds costing mana/sec if casted again he will lose the wall  (wall still works for 5 sec but cant be moves)

E: Blast The Way: Abox runs like a light beam in a range (like {{summoner:4}} or {{champion:81}} E) dealing Ability Damage to enemies in the way if casted again he will look back shooting 6 plasma shots to enemies in the way for 1.5 sec

R: Massive Destruction: Abox destroys the gravity in a big area for 3 seconds stunning enemies and after 3 sec dealing Ability Damage (AP) to them

He is melee and can be found jungler with these abilities

Hope you guys like it i can't post any splash art or something like that because my laptop is broken and i sold my PC i only have some hand drawn im going to upload em soon hope you guys like it and get me some more ideas And im already working on his stats

My names Ryan and my bro is Karan we play in this acc (i my ideas from my dad too xD )

GL;HF
